name: Smash Or Pass The Youtuber
description: Smash Or Pass The Youtuber is a clicker game, inspired by the viral youtube videos. Smash or pass challenge is a well known challenge among youtubers. Playing the game is simple. Decide if you will pass, or if you will ... smash the youtuber. Physical appereance, names and channel genre will be the only information provided to you. Choose wisely, some of them are "future stars" and the will give you extra "self esteem points", if you decide not to pass. By levelling up, you will unlock more youtubers, different themes and clothes.
